#Version requirments for MoonPy

These are the general requirments for each major release of MoonPy. Currently we are working towards the version 0.6.00 release.

= Requirements for version 0.5.00=

  * At least two players can play together: complete
  * Ability to draw map and display hubs: complete
  * Players are able to choose a direction and power level: complete
  * Hubs show direction indicator: complete
  * Players can fire both bombs and hubs at each: complete
  * Players take turns: complete

= Requirements for version 0.6.00 =

  * Map shows distances accurately (non isometric): complete
  * Buttons recognize being 'held down': complete
  * Map has more accurate unit placement (increased resolution): complete
  * GUI displays all relevant information required by player: in process

= Requirements for version 0.7.00 = 

  * At least 4 players can play together: planned
  * Units require energy: planned
  * Map has energy pools on it: planned
  * Energy collectors provide energy to player: planned
  * Game processes rounds in addition to turns: planned
  * Game animation is working correctly: planned

= Requirements for version 0.8.00 =

  * Map displays water
  * Units/tethers are destroyed if they land in water
  * Game generates random maps
  * Towers can be launched
  * Offense can be launched and function correctly
  * Mines can be launched and function correctly
  * Spikes can be launched and function correctly
  * Bridges work correctly
  * Repairs work correctly

= Requirements for version 0.9.00 = 
  * All OMBC units/weapons implemented and working correctly

= Requirements for version 1.0.00 = 
  * Fog of War
  * Wind
  * Ability to create custom maps
  * Ability to load/save games
